p: The Aichi targets under the CBD, which have informed the target setting on biodiversity and conservation in the SDGs, expired in 2020. New targets are being defined in the process leading to the post-2020 Biodiversity Framework of the CBD. This process has been extended into 2021 due to the disruptions caused by the pandemic. For further detail on the state of the process, please see: https://www.cbd.int/conferences/post2020
